name: Starburst Force
description:
Hello, this game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare Game-Jam by 2 indie developers.

Controls:

Keyboard:

WASD - Move
Arrows - Shoot
E - Start Wave
P/Esc - Pause

Controller:

L Joystick: Move
R Joystick: Shoot
Square Button: Start Wave
X Button: Pause

Resources: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/play
https://www.behance.net/gallery/36169711/Exan-3-Free-Font
https://pixabay.com/
https://mixkit.co/
https://www.solarsystemscope.com/textures/ 

Apps we used:
Unreal Engine 4
Garage Band
Blender 3D
Krita
Where to find us? 

Sandor Tudor: https://www.instagram.com/sandortudor89/ 
Racsan Rares: https://www.instagram.com/raresracsan/

If you have any questions feel free to contact us.
